SEARCH
Package br.dev.rplus.cup.config

Class Value

java.lang.Object
br.dev.rplus.cup.config.Value
public class Value extends Object
A flexible wrapper class that allows dynamic access and type-safe conversion of an underlying value, typically used for parsed configuration entries.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Value(Object value)
    Constructs a new Value wrapping the provided object.

      the value as a string, or null if the value is null.

      the value as an integer
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the value cannot be converted.

      Throws:

      Returns:
      the value as a double.
      Throws:

    • asList

      public List<Value> asList()
      Converts the value to a List of Value elements.
      Returns:
      the value as a list of Value.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the value is not a list.

    • asMap

      public Map<String,Value> asMap()
      Converts the value to a Map with String keys and Value values.
      Returns:
      the value as a map.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the value is not a map or contains non-string keys.

    • isNull

      public boolean isNull()
      Checks if the underlying value is null.
      Returns:
      true if the value is null, false otherwise.

    • raw

      public Object raw()
      Returns the raw wrapped object.
      Returns:
      the original object value.
